FAQ 1 - question: Is a prior experience required to participate to the programs?
FAQ 1 - answer: No prior experience or specific health conditions: the activities are tailored to the needs and the level of each guest.
FAQ 2 - question: Does La Réserve Ramatuelle offer individual or group programs?
FAQ 2 - answer: Each program is personalized. All the sessions are in one to one.
FAQ 3 - question: Do the programs start on specific day of the week?
FAQ 3 - answer: The programs can start any day of the week, depending on the availabilities of La Réserve Ramatuelle.
FAQ 4 - question: Is it possible to organise a longer program?
FAQ 4 - answer: The standard program durations are 3 days 4 nights and 5 days 6 nights. Longer durations can be organised upon request.
FAQ 5 - question: Which programs at La Réserve Ramatuelle include a medical assessment?
FAQ 5 - answer: The Women's Better-Aging program includes a comprehensive assessment and an online consultation with a doctor of Clinique Nescens.
